#labels Phase-Implementation,Manual
*jscep* artifacts are now available from  [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/google/code/jscep/ Maven Central].  The dependency details are as follows:

|| groupId || *com.google.code.jscep* ||
|| artifactId || *jscep* ||
|| version || *2.0* ||

For example, to add *jscep* as a dependency to your own Maven project, add the following to your `pom.xml`:

{{{
<dependencies>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>com.google.code.jscep</groupId>
        <artifactId>jscep</artifactId>
        <version>2.0</version>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>
}}}

== Ivy ==

{{{
<dependency org="com.google.code.jscep" name="jscep" rev="2.0" />
}}}

== Repository Hosting ==

Maven repository hosting for *jscep* artifacts is provided by [http://nexus.sonatype.org/oss-repository-hosting.html Sonatype].
